title: En Uyir ennai vittu lyrics Ra One Song Lyrics
stanzas:
Song: En Uyir ennai vittu
Singers: Chinmayee
Lyrics: Vairamuthu
Movie: Ra one.
Music: Vishal-Shekhar

En, Uyir ennai vittu pirindha pinne
en dhegam mattum vazhnthidumo
kannerile meen vaazhumo
Ne, en udalukul uyir allava
orey uyir naam allavo
udal vazhave,uyir pogumo

Irudhayam thulaana piragu
Idigalai thaangadhu pattupoochi siragu
ini endhan vaazhve veeno, verumayo

Mannil mel oru maamalaiyum vizhundhadhum enna
Malai vaan konda aruvigal veelndhu aluvadhum enna (2)

When you go when you leave then you take a little piece of me
There's a hole in my soul coz you take a little piece of me

Un kannil dhaane naan paarthu kondaen
en kanne ponaal naan enna kaanben
un seviyil thaane naan oligal ketpen
seviye ponaal yaar paadal ketpen
kannirandum kaneeril mithakka
kaatruku nizhal illai kaneerai thudaika
vaazhvinai ilandhapin vaazhva oh nee vaa vaa (Mannil mel oru..)

Nadhiyodu pogum, kumil pola vaazhkai
enge udaiyum yaar solla koodum
Elaiyodu valaiyum mazhai neerai pola
udalodu jeevan sollamal pogum
yire naan enna aaven
unarve illaadha kannaadi pole
maranathai vella vazhi illaya nee soll..

Mannil mel oru maamalaiyum vilundhadhum enna
Malai vaan konda aruvigal veelndhu aluvadhum enna (repeats)
